## Suggester.onCharacterEntry() method

Called for each character entry and can be used to disable certain characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onCharacterEntry?(params: SuggestCharacterEntryParams<GCommand>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>SuggestCharacterEntryParams&lt;GCommand&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

## Remarks

For example you may want to disable all `@` symbols while the suggester is active. Return `true` to prevent any further character handlers from running.
